text: Claude Ambrose Virgin (8 June 1928 - 1 December 2006) was an American-born British fashion photographer, particularly for British Vogue. He was born in Atlanta, Georgia; Virgin's first wife was Margaret Barch; they had one daughter. His second wife was Jillie Bateman; they had two sons. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2006 deaths Category:20th-century American photographers Category:20th-century British photographers Category:Fashion photographers
title: Claude Virgin
